title: Suspended for literal no reason
body: I got suspended for 14 days for being toxic apparently I literally just called my support bad and called my team bad cos they were doing so bad the enemy team was being toxic to me and i was suspended for being toxic rito fix your game just because someone gets reported alot means nothing like wtf i got fkn suspended and i also spend  700+ dollars on it like match me with some good team mates if you dont want me to call my team mates trash they started calling me trash before i did anything my "support" was roaming at 2 minutes and my "mid lane" was stolen by a brand who instalocked how am I toxic rito. Also if a premade of 5 just reported one player he wouild get chat restricted for no reason

replies.body:
I really recommend you start focusing on reform. 

If you received a 14 day ban it means **your next punishment will be a permanent ban**. You're really close to loosing your account and $700 forever :(

Flaming your team is not ok, regardless of who started it. You really need to start muting players who are insulting you and report them after the game. Stop taking matters into your own hands and flaming them back, when you do this you become just as bad as them, and will get punished like them.

Feel free to reply with anything you need help on. I'd hate to see you loose your account over something so easy to fix.
If i Start being good again and stuff does it go back to like chat restriction or no, because i really dont want to lose more than 700 dollars cos my parents will kill me

Short answer yes, but it won't be an overnight thing. Once the system believes you are demonstrating good behaviour it will start dropping you down tiers. Please note that the AVERAGE punished player takes about 3 months to drop their account back into good standing, however int his instance "average" refers to a player on a 10 game chat restriction. Since you are on a 14 day ban it will take you a lot longer to get back to good standing.

I won't sugarcoat this, you are on very thin ice at the moment, and one significant slip up will cost you your account.

I suggest you find other ways to vent your frustration, yell at your screen rather than typing or type into a notepad instead. Even if it takes valuable seconds out of your gameplay it's better than ruining the experience of your entire team.
Well apparently you didn't reform the first two times so...
I DID NOTHING TILL THEY STARTED CCALLING ME BAD THEN I CALLED THEM BAD WHY DID ONLY ME GET SUSPENDED

> [{quoted}](name=Totally A Scrubb,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=grf793Vk,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-22T00:50:45.371+0000)
>
> I DID NOTHING TILL THEY STARTED CCALLING ME BAD THEN I CALLED THEM BAD WHY DID ONLY ME GET SUSPENDED

You getting suspended doesn't mean they didn't as well. There are a lot of factors that go into this though, such as you consistently being toxic, and any previous punishments you've experienced. Also, if premade players all report one person, their reports have less weight than a single player, so no, being reported once by a premade group will not get you punished.
Best Advice i have seen for leage when solo cuing. - Mute all- Just concentrate on Play and pings.

2 wrongs don't make 1 right. Someone being an asshole doesn't mean you're suddenly above law and moral that you could abuse them no problem.

Similarly, just because you've spent money, it doesn't mean you're suddenly above the system and balance and that you could demand things being laid your way no problem.

Maybe there are some random places where you could do both of the above and get away with it, but LoL isn't one of them.

.........................

Of course, if your teammates were really just toxic as you claim them to be, they should be banned too. But then again, 2 wrongs don't make 1 right, you were clearly doing it wrong when you start typing furiously at people and calling them names. While the severity of the punishment is maybe up for debates, but the notion of you being punished is however, not something I'd see to be unjust.

Being toxic to your team is not OK, even if they are trolling/feeding. If they are annoying them you need to just put up with it/mute them and report them at the end of the game. They might have got banned too if you reported them. No matter what they did it is not OK to flame them. If you can reform then you can save your account from being perma-banned and losing all the money you spent on it.
Well for starters putting money into a game doesn't grant you greater privileges than anyone else, and from what I can tell you deserved a ban for toxicity
I got banned for also telling people to sit down when i kill them like what???
